d.name: Mysterious Punk
d.phase: Hey! Psssst... Come here!
d.a: Approach the punk and see what he wants
Ignore him, better to stay away from strangers.
d.phase: Listen, I've got an interesting proposition for you.
d.a: Excuse me! I thought you were talking to me! Goodbye
d.phase: Shhhht!!! Not so loud! Someone might hear us....
d.a: Ooops, sorry? Why does it matter if someone hears us?
d.phase: Shhhht!!! Not so loud! Someone might see us....

Ok. I have a passport for Totem Island. What do you say to a little bet to see if you can win it from me? You must bet 10.000 gold coins. If you win, you can leave with passport and your money. If you lose, I keep the passport and you'll owe me 10.000 gold coins. What do you say?
d.a: Why not. It seems like a fair deal.
What!? Are you crazy! Where will I get all that money from?
d.phase: Ok. Listen carefully the rules: Each coin has two different sides. The side with the value on it is called "tails". The second with the head of a moueffe on it is called "heads". All you have to do is choose a side. Do you understand?
d.a: All I have to do is choose heads or tails?
Uh, I didn't understand anything, what do I have to do?
d.phase: Too bad ... Come back if you change your mind, I'll stay here.
Ha, you understand? It seems that you've played this kind of game before. So, which side do you choose, "heads" or "tails"?

Each coin has two different sides. The side with the value is called "tails". The second representing a moueffe face is called "heads". You just have to choose one side. After we toss the coin, we'll check who has won. So, "heads" or "tails"?
You lose! Ha ha ha! I'm unbeatable. You owe me 10.000 gold coins.
d.a: But ... you didn't even toss the coin!
d.phase: Don't be so mad? Money is far too precious to play with! If you bring me my 10.000 gold coins, maybe I'll offer you another deal ... and next time, maybe we'll toss a coin.
d.a: If I want this passport, it seems I don't have much of a choice
d.phase: Ha ha! Find the money and then come back. My code name is "Yakuzi", I'll stay here and wait for you.
You lose! Ha ha ha! I'm unbeatable. You owe me 10.000 gold coins.
You disregard his calls and move away ... maybe he had something important to tell you.

d.name: Yakuzi
d.phase: Hey! Psssst ... Come here!
d.a: Approach him and see what he wants
Ignore him, and run away quickly.
d.phase: So? You have the money?
d.a: Yes, but I'll never give it to a cheater like you!
d.phase: Ha ha! Thanks, come back whenever you want!
Hey, wait. Where do you think you're going!

d.name: Yakuzi
d.phase: Hey! Psssst ... Come here!
d.a: Ignore him, and run away quickly.
d.phase: Here's my deal, we bet 100.000 this time. If you win, you can take all my money and the passport. If you lose, I'll keep it and you'll owe me 100.000 gold coins. If you accept the deal, give me a coin that I can toss....
d.a: Ok, here's a coin, but no tricks this time!
Ok, I accept the bet, but I want to toss the coin myself!
No way! I don't trust you anymore. Goodbye.
d.phase: Ok, "Heads" or "Tails"?
Ting! Yakuzi tosses the coin up in the air. It falls on the ground, still spinning. The suspense is unbearable.
Ok, I choose tails, no wait! heads!
Ting! You toss the coin up in the air. It falls on the ground, still spinning. The suspense is unbearable.
Impossible ... I've lost ... Oh no! It's mine! You'll never catch me, ha ha ha ha!
Yakuzi has run away with your reward, maybe you should run after him....
Hey wait!
Hey you! Wait!

d.name: Disguised Yakuzi
d.phase: You pass someone who you think you recognise....
d.a: Hey Yakuzi! I thought I recognised you. Give me my reward!
d.phase: Sorry? I think that you've made a mistake. My name is Benedito Pacifico Juan Mawia Ramirez. Excuse me, I have to leave. I have urgent things to attend to.
d.a: You won't esacpe this time! My Dinoz have surrounded you
Ha, seems that I made a mistake ... Hurry up, or you'll miss it
d.phase: Very well ... it seems I have no choice. En garde!
Yakuzi has disappeared before the end of the fight. There are too many tracks to see which way he has gone.
See you again soon Yakuzi! Grrrr!

d.name: Frozen Yakuzi
d.phase: I'm ... fro ... zen....
d.a: That's strange, it sounds like you're...
d.phase: I ... am ... an ... ordinary ... person ... complet ... ely ... frozen ... ... You ... can ... lea... ve...
d.a: Give me my reward, or I'll ask my Dinoz to melt you!
Don't move, I'm going to go and get some help!
d.phase: No, don't worry. I was only pretending to be frozen. You're hard to convince aren't you aren't you?
Not so fast! First I have to take revenge. Prepare your Dinoz, I will defeat them this time!
Uh, yea thanks ... hmm, I wanted to say: than ... ks ... stran ... ger....
Once more Yakuzi has fled ... but whilst escaping he dropped a strange scroll! Maybe you can find someone who can decipher it for you....

d.name: Yakuzi
d.phase: Phew! What a fight! Professor Igor was really strong!
Yup, but it's a long story ... Where do I begin....

Indeed, that's a good idea! On my 18th birthday, I received the heirloom of my Grandfather, which had been passed down through generation to generation in my family. Until then, I was only a little thug, but this heirloom changed everything for me!
Yes. It wasn't about the money, but a unique item that we call the Kabuki Aura, as well as a scroll showing how to build another one.
Yup, I lost it fighting against you, and Professor Igor apparently used it to build an Aura and travel to the Totem Island...

It's simple: many centuries ago, my ancestor the Grand Judoki saved a group of Kabukis at the moment of the Huge Cataclysm. He then moved to the island and built a Totem that protected it from intruders....
Although they are great fighters, the Kabukis can only give birth in a very quiet place. As they're so rare, my ancestor wanted to them to survive here in peace....

When I inherited my grandfather's possessions, Professor Igor came to me and offered me millions of gold coins in exchange for the Aura of the scroll. Fearing the worst, I refused. He seemed very strange and I knew his intentions weren't good....
So I went to Totem Island myself and discovered the Kabukis. They're so likeable that I decided to rear two of them myself. They're the same ones which helped me during our fights!
Yes, I'm very proud of them! But to raise them, I had to become a thug again, organising some scam....sorry, games of chance, so that the pig... sorry, tourists can relax a bit, you see?
In any case, take this. Thanks to you, I was able to prevent a disaster. I don't know how to thank you....
d.a: Oh! You don't need to thank me!
d.phase: Really? But let me give you this Kabuki Egg as reward! Take care of it, it's a very rare item! Unlike other Dinoz, the Kabukis only produce a small amount of eggs!
Ah ... Well ... Come back if you change your mind....
Here, it's yours! You can keep the Kabuki Aura that the Professor Igor have made, it'll help you to come back here from time to time. See you soon my friend!

d.name: Yakuzi
d.phase: Hello my friend! How are you?
Nothing to report! But come back later, maybe I'll have something for you!
I've already given you one Kabuki Egg, please come back later to get another one!

d.name: Yakuzi
d.phase: Hello my friend! How are you?
Nothing to report! But come back later, maybe I'll have something for you!

Oh! A new Kabuki Egg is available, I'm selling it for 50.000 coins if you're interested! The money isn't for me though, it's for a good deed ... this fund will allow me to continue to help the surviving Kabukis!
I understand, but if you change your mind, come back soon as this kind of offer won't last long!
THANKS! Here you go! Don't forget to take good care of it!
Kabukis are close to extinction because so many Dinoz Masters buy their eggs. I'm really sorry but I can't give you any more eggs ... I have to protect their future!
